channel.title: New at The Book of Secret Knowledge
channel.description: New at The Book of Secret Knowledge

item.title: add desc (tls search engine)
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: TLS Cipher Suite Search- cipher suite search engine.

item.title: add new subsection: docker security
item.description:
##### :black_small_square: Security


  :small_orange_diamond: docker-bench-security - is a script that checks for dozens of common best-practices around deploying Docker.

  :small_orange_diamond: trivy - vulnerability scanner for containers, suitable for CI.

  :small_orange_diamond: Harbor - cloud native registry project that stores, signs, and scans content.

item.title: fix typos
item.description:
_Hashing_
hash :no_entry: plaintext

_Symmetric encryption_
plaintext :arrow_right: :key: :arrow_right: ciphertext

plaintext :arrow_left: :key: :arrow_left: ciphertext

_Asymmetric encryption_
plaintext :arrow_right: :key: :arrow_right: ciphertext

plaintext :arrow_left: :part_alternation_mark: :arrow_left: ciphertext

(:key: public key, :part_alternation_mark: private key)

_Encoding_
text :arrow_right: encoded

item.title: add 'Hashing, encryption and encoding'
item.description:
###### Hashing, encryption and encoding (by [Michal Špaček](https://twitter.com/spazef0rze))
**Hashing**
hash :no_entry: plaintext
plaintext :arrow_right: hash
**Symmetric encryption**
plaintext :arrow_right: :key: :arrow_right: ciphertext
plaintext :arrow_left: :key: :arrow_left: ciphertext
(:key: shared key)
**Asymmetric encryption**
plaintext :arrow_right: :key: :arrow_right: ciphertext
plaintext :arrow_left: :part_alternation_mark: :arrow_left: ciphertext
(:key: public key, :part_alternation_mark: private key)
**Encoding**
text :arrow_right: encoded
text :arrow_left: encoded

item.title: add 'Linux Hardening Guide'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: Linux Hardening Guide - how to harden Linux as much as possible for security and privacy.

item.title: add new resources (crypto)
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: Cryptography_1 - materials used whilst taking Prof. Dan Boneh Stanford Crypto course.

  :small_orange_diamond: Crypton - library to learn and practice Offensive and Defensive Cryptography.

item.title: add 'nip.io'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: nip.io - dead simple wildcard DNS for any IP Address.

item.title: add 'zorexeye'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: zorexeye - search for sites, images, apps, softwares & more.

item.title: add 'littleosbook'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: littleosbook - the little book about OS development.

item.title: add 'Ebooks' chapter; minor updates
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: gnulinux.guru - collection of cheat sheets about bash, vim and networking.


##### :black_small_square: Ebooks


  :small_orange_diamond: free-programming-books - list of free learning resources in many languages.

item.title: Merge pull request #187 from unixorn/add-zsh-plugin-list
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: Awesome ZSH Plugins - A list of frameworks, plugins, themes and tutorials for ZSH.

  :small_orange_diamond: Rust Scan - to find all open ports faster than Nmap.

  :small_orange_diamond: Browsh - is a fully interactive, real-time, and modern text-based browser.

item.title: Merge pull request #185 from cesarosum/master
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: Qubes OS - is a security-oriented OS that uses Xen-based virtualization to create and manage isolated compartments called qubes.

  :small_orange_diamond: Qubes OS - is a security-oriented OS that uses Xen-based virtualization.
